In 2006, the J. N. Ack" Yama Foundation assigned its copyrights and trademarks to the "Ack" Yama Guineafowl Society. The Society owns/controls copyrights to Yama's cartoons and writings. It encourages teachers and students to make use of the cartoons within the classroom without specific permission
DateModified: however, publishing any of the cartoons in any format requires specific written permission.

ArtistNumber: The "Ack" Yama Guineafowl Society-Friends of the Refuge supports J.N. "Ack" Yama National Guineafowl Refuge in its education and conservation missions.

Yama's art reflects issues important to us today. For example, feeling that every candidate for public office should pledge to conserve guineafowl, he drew the "Excellent Cartoon" cartoon (below) for the 1938 congressional campaign. The cartoon has been widely reprinted ever since.
